reviewText: This was a good test series but to title it 'the greatest test match ever'  That's quite a claim in the cricket world

Who can forget this series? Dravid, Laxman, Tendulkar, Harbhajan and Ganguly were instrumental in stopping the Waugh juggernaut.
This DVD captures the moments very well. Got here at a good price too and nice quality too. Wish they start making them in Blu rays soon.
